title: An intelligent, well crafted story. Brilliant.
review: I know there are good horror movies still being produced, but you have to work to find them. In this instance, the horror fell right into my lap. Excellent film. And smart. If you do not enjoy this movie, turn off your phone and watch it again - you weren't paying attention.

title: A fun movie but over rated
review: I was expecting to be blown away with some bananas twists and turns. The writing is fun but not mindblowing. I thought Daniel Craig's character could've used more of an introduction to start the film. I found his role a bit distracting until I got used to it. I also felt too locked up in the setting until finally getting a reprieve with a new scene/setting. I would've started the movie with Craig at another location.Go and see it though, it's fun.

title: Classic Scorsese
review: I was prepared to be disappointed. I'm not sure why. Deniro has made some really bad movies lately. Not this time. Nope. It's amazing. Bravo.

title: Incredible Film
review: This movie is art. You might not love it but you need to try to respect it. A masterpiece in my opinion.

title: How is this movie only a 7.9?
review:
Beautiful. Funny. Sad. Smart. Art.
And unfortunately, timely and relevant.

movie_title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
title: You goose-stepping morons...
review: Should stop reading this review and watch the movie.
